short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roll 1d10000 on Net Libram's Random Magical Effects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Net Libram's Magical Effects by Orrex 
https://centralia.aquest.com/downloads/NLRMEv2.pdf
This chart provides 10000 random effects that might happen when your D&D 5e GM decides you need to roll wild magic.  However, the fact that it's 10000 items can slow down play by having to go find your roll in the list.  This extension automatically rolls for you and even adds the response to your roll20 chat for all to see!
